name: Farcast Prototype V0.1
description:
A game about exploring and slaying monsters. Make money and get stronger!

THIS PROJECT IS STILL IN DEVELOPMENT

----------------------

Controls:
WASD - move
Space - Dash
Left Click - Use Item
E - interact/pickup
G - Inventory
